item.title: Raspberry PI Resources
item.description: Some raspberry Pi resources. Raspberry PI WiringPI

Messaging and Communications ZeroMQ :: is a messaging package that has an emphasis on fast and intuitive API. Man I hope this package is as good as it's beginning guide Gorilla/mux :: A built to serve up REST api's, gorilla does that and some more important stuff like serve up static websites and provide support for initiating websockets Gorilla/websocket :: Handles the full websocket spec. Works great with the standard http router and Gorilla/mux the full featured router.
